data.name: Rounds of Zombies
data.detailed_description:
The original zombies survival. the more rounds you survive, the harder the game will get.
Buy doors to unlock sections of the map. Buy guns off the wall to defend yourself against the waves of zombies. Get a random gun out of the Lucky Shot. Upgrade your gun at the Exalter. Buy upgrades from the booster machines located around the maps.

Features:
Online co-op and Singleplayer
Global leaderboards
3 Maps
Multiple types of zombies
Upgrades to your player and guns


join this discord: https://discord.gg/GKEddrvyrp

data.short_description: Classic zombie round survival. choose a map and see how many rounds you can survive with friends or alone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 @2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 @3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
